definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: usu. piece, bar (?), in phr. [[מִתְרַפֵּס בְּרַחֵי כָָסֶף]] Ps 68:31, but very obscure and dub.; Aq. Vulgate wheels; LXX Symm [[חְרֻפֵי]]; Che [[בְּבִחְרֵי]] [[כסף]], or ´[[בְּבֶחֵע כ]]:, or (JBL:xi (1892), 125) ´[[בְּרׂחֵי כ]]: (i.e. mercenaries); Pott We [[בְּרׂחֵי כָזׇב]]; Du [[בְּרׂחֵי סִפְּךָ]].
